briefTitle: Understanding Patient Experience and Preferences for the QT Scanner Compared to Mammography
officialTitle: Understanding Patient Experience and Preferences for the QT Scanner Compared to Mammography
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Have used the QT Scanner
* Have used mammography
* Speak English
* Willing to provide consent and participate in the survey

Exclusion Criteria:

• Excluded if all Inclusion Criteria are not met
